text:
@SenSchumer This story shows what happens when a country uses science & has an intelligent leader.
S.Korea discovered the 1st #COVID case the same day as the US.
They’re re-opened. 255 deaths in a pop of 52M. Watch the video & note the Dr. who says testing is key.

https://t.co/xtmOGIDjP9 https://t.co/T0J7VLrg7Y

entity.description: Extraterrestre de 900 ans, le Docteur est un aventurier qui voyage à travers le temps et l'espace à l'aide de son vaisseau, le TARDIS. Ils fait de nombreuses rencontres sur les diverses planètes qu'il explore...

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
